meanings.definition: An outgrowth or projection of a body or part.
meanings.sent1: The tree had small excrescences on its branches.
meanings.sent2: The excrescences on the plant were carefully pruned by the gardener.
meanings.sent3: The excrescences on the pumpkin made it look like a strange creature.
meanings.sent4: The excrescences of corruption spread throughout the organization.
meanings.sent5: The excrescences on the rock face resembled tiny fingers reaching out.

meanings.definition: An abnormal or disfiguring outgrowth or addition.
meanings.sent1: The tumor was identified as an excrescence on the patient's skin.
meanings.sent2: The excrescences on the old building were a result of neglect over the years.
meanings.sent3: The excrescences on the statue made it look comically lopsided.
meanings.sent4: The excrescences of lies grew larger with each passing day.
meanings.sent5: The excrescences on the painting seemed to come alive in the dim light.
